scripts.dev: npx kill-port 5155 && node -e "setTimeout(() => process.exit(0), 2000)" && vite --config vite.config.development.js
scripts.dev:host: npx kill-port 5155 && node -e "setTimeout(() => process.exit(0), 2000)" && VITE_HOST=true vite --config vite.config.development.js --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.preview: npx kill-port 5155 && node -e "setTimeout(() => process.exit(0), 2000)" && vite preview --config vite.config.production.js
scripts.preview:host: npx kill-port 5155 && node -e "setTimeout(() => process.exit(0), 2000)" && VITE_PREVIEW_HOST=true vite preview --config vite.config.production.js --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.deploy:workers: npm run deploy:auth && npm run deploy:forms
scripts.precommit: npm run security:check && npm run build
